In rerun::external::re_log_encoding::stream_rrd_from_http

rerun::external::re_log_encoding::stream_rrd_from_http

Function stream_rrd_from_http_to_channel

Source 
pub fn stream_rrd_from_http_to_channel(
    url: String,
    follow: bool,
    on_msg: Option<Box<dyn Fn() + Sync + Send>>,
) -> Receiver<LogMsg>
Expand description

Stream an rrd file from a HTTP server.

If follow_if_http is true, and the url is an HTTP source, the viewer will open the stream in Following mode rather than Playing mode.

on_msg can be used to wake up the UI thread on Wasm.
